blueprint_book.label: Space Exploration (v0.6.30)
blueprint_book.description:
Blueprints for Space Exploration games that use the "self building" system from my self-building-factory:
https://factorioprints.com/view/-MNZWdWosuqr3vtaC2hD

0.6.30:
* Un-merged chests in Mall.
* Added missing power poles and fixed blue belt in Bricks & Glass.
* Fixed Basic Cores to require len=6 trains.
* Fixed self-build of Nuclear (480MW).
* Added missing prod3 modules to Refinery solid fuel.
* Many other small fixes.
